attributes.action: Force the government to repair the potholes and unsafe road surfaces in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Because it is causing a danger to people driving on roads that should be, at the very least, driveable.
attributes.background: Engage contractors and/or councils to repair and make good all roads.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fix Our Roads: National Plan on Dangerous Potholes Now
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739014
